durations.name: Sprint!
durations.description: 10 seconds of stress! Smash through your questions using your instincts to guide you.

durations.name: Casual
durations.description: A moderate test size of half a minute to leave you a little breathing space between questions.

durations.name: Seems like forever
durations.description: How many question can you get right in one minute? Triple figures puts you at Jedi status.
